mapper.insert: insert into public.t_app_log_login (log_login_id, cust_id, login_date, login_ip, login_type) values (#{logLoginId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginType,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into public.t_app_log_login
log_login_id,
cust_id,
login_date,
login_ip,
login_type,
#{logLoginId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{custId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update public.t_app_log_login
cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login_date = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_type = #{loginType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where log_login_id = #{logLoginId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT log.log_login_id, cust.cust_id, cust.cust_code, cust.mobile, cust.head_img, cust.nick_name, cust.sex, log.login_type, log.login_ip, log.login_date FROM t_customer cust left join t_app_log_login log on cust.cust_id = log.cust_id where log_login_id = #{logLoginId}

select cust.cust_code, cust.mobile, cust.head_img, cust.nick_name, cust.sex, sp.province_name, sp.province_short, company.company_name, company.job, cust.is_member, cust.is_forbid, cust.register_date /*log.login_date*/ from t_customer cust left join t_sys_province sp on cust.province_id = sp.province_id left join t_customer_company company on company.cust_id = cust.cust_id where cust.cust_id = #{custId}
